item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Foster's Restaurant
New Haven, CT 06511

Owner/Manager-Dave Foster

If you've ever watched WTNH Channel 8 news you will know that Foster's is the restaurant of chef-extraodinaire Dave Foster, where he is a regular guest chef on their cooking & dining spot, always surprising with delicious and unique cuisine! (Showcasing "eccentric American" cuisine as their website states.)

We have GREAT specials for the group this week:

** $5 Well Drinks & Well Martinis
** $5 Wine
** $1 off all Beer

Chef Dave will serve COMPLIMENTARY appetizers to those who bring toys!!!

Contact: Robyn-Allise
Phone: 203-823-5302


*** This is a special TOYS FOR TOTS DRIVE***

T'is the holiday season and Santa needs our help! Don't let the kids miss out this year due to our horrid economy.

Lets give the children a wonderful Christmas and a very happy holiday season. If every HH attendee can bring one NEW unwrapped toy, we really can make a difference.

If anyone would like to volunteer to drop off all the NHC toys, please add that in your RSVP. Thank you.


Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Toys for Tots night at Foster's Restaurant
